Description_lang: Throughout everything, Kayn has been the rock upon which all else breaks. Where others began to question Illidan's methods, Kayn stood resolute, insisting that the destruction of the Burning Legion was all that mattered. He is a puisant fighter, skill tactician, and unparalleled politician.
AuraDescription_lang: Kayn Sunfury has mastered the ways of the Havoc demon hunter. He is respected for his leadership and unwavering faith in the Illidari.

description_blz.en_US: Throughout everything, Kayn has been the rock upon which all else breaks. Where others began to question Illidan's methods, Kayn stood resolute, insisting that the destruction of the Burning Legion was all that mattered. He is a puisant fighter, skill tactician, and unparalleled politician.
description_blz.es_MX: Desde siempre, Kayn ha sido una gran roca impenetrable. Cuando los demás comenzaron a cuestionar los métodos de Illidan, Kayn se mantuvo firme en la postura de que la destrucción de la Legión Ardiente era todo lo que importaba. Un combatiente destacado, estratega diestro y político sin igual.
description_blz.pt_BR: Kayn mantém-se firme como uma rocha mesmo que o mundo desmorone ao seu redor; não importa o que aconteça. Quando outros passaram a questionar os métodos de Illidan, Kayn permaneceu resoluto, insistindo que a destruição da Legião Ardente é tudo o que importa. É um lutador poderoso, um sagaz estrategista e um político sem igual.
description_blz.de_DE: Kayn war durchgehend der unbezwingbare Fels in der Brandung. Wo andere begannen, Illidans Methoden zu hinterfragen, stand Kayn zu dessen Kurs und drängte darauf, dass einzig die Zerstörung der Brennenden Legion von wahrer Bedeutung sei. Er ist ein starker Kämpfer, geübter Taktiker und beispielloser Politiker.
description_blz.en_GB: Throughout everything, Kayn has been the rock upon which all else breaks. Where others began to question Illidan's methods, Kayn stood resolute, insisting that the destruction of the Burning Legion was all that mattered. He is a puisant fighter, skill tactician, and unparalleled politician.
description_blz.es_ES: A pesar de todo, Kayn ha sido la roca donde rompían todas las olas. Cuando los demás dudaron de los métodos de Illidan, Kayn permaneció firme, convencido de que la destrucción de la Legión Ardiente era lo único importante. Es un luchador nato, un brillante estratega y un político sin igual.
description_blz.fr_FR: Solide comme un roc en toutes circonstances et convaincu que rien n’est plus important que la destruction de la Légion ardente, Kayn a su faire preuve de la plus ferme détermination quand d’autres contestaient les méthodes d’Illidan. Redoutable combattant et tacticien hors pair, il est également un politicien sans pareil.
description_blz.it_IT: Per tutta la sua vita, Kayn è sempre stato una roccia. Quando altri cominciarono a mettere in discussione i metodi di Illidan, Kayn rimase irremovibile, convinto che la distruzione della Legione Infuocata fosse tutto ciò che contava. È un combattente possente, un abile tattico e un politico senza precedenti.
description_blz.ru_RU: Что бы ни происходило, Кайн всегда оставался верен себе. Когда другие иллидари стали открыто критиковать методы Иллидана, Кайн твердо стоял на своем, утверждая, что полное и окончательное уничтожение Пылающего Легиона – единственное, что имеет значение. Кайн – сильный боец, опытный тактик и великолепный политик.
description_blz.ko_KR: 그 모든 일을 겪으면서도 카인은 언제나 한결같았습니다. 모든 이가 일리단의 방식에 의문을 제기했을 때에도, 그는 불타는 군단을 파멸시키는 것만이 유일한 목표라며 뜻을 굽히지 않았습니다. 카인은 강력한 투사인 동시에 빼어난 전술가이며, 타의 추종을 불허하는 정치가이기도 합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在歷經一切考驗之後，凱恩成為其他人難望其項背的中流砥柱。雖然其他人開始質疑伊利丹的方法，但是凱恩堅決不移，並認定毀滅燃燒軍團才是一切最優先事項的信念。他是個強而有力的戰士、技巧出眾的謀士，也是個難以匹敵的政治家。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在经历一切后，凯恩如同废墟中屹立不动的柱石。当其他人开始质疑伊利丹的方法时，凯恩依然坚定不移地认为，摧毁燃烧军团才是重中之重。他是一名强大的战士，精明的战略家，同时也是一位无与伦比的政治家。
